item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, my name is Dave Thomas and Im a software engineer from the Uk. I work primarily in F# but also like to tinker with pretty much any interesting language. Im drawn to more functional languages like F#, Elixir, Elm, but also like to use Go, Rust, and recently Pony. When Im not working I like: playing guitar, woodworking, watercolour sketching, and practicing yoga. Have questions or suggestions?
